title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Furniture Schedule Second Floor, Master Bedroom, Hall, Dressing Room", 1937–38
medium: Graphite, black ink, red and blue color pencil on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite and red color pencil, upper center: FURNITURE SCHEDULE ANDERSON HOUSE; upper left in blue color pencil: SECOND FLOOR; materials, dimensions, descriptions in graphite
description: Furniture schedule for second floor, detailing room, piece, drawing number, quantity, size, woods, finish, interiors, hardware, upholstery specimans and yardage, fabrics, glass mirror, lighting electrical, and remarks.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Furniture Schedule Second Floor, Master Bedroom, Hall, Dressing Room", 1937–38.
1937–38. Graphite, black ink, red and blue color pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-639.
